title: How do I get feedback to Riot about solo-/dynamicQ?
body:
I want to give feedback about the state of the game and how the loss of soloQ and the current implementation of dynamicQ has driven me away from playing. Since every thread about soloQ gets ignored on the forums and since the reddit mods delete similar thready because of being a repost, how do I get to Riot about this topic? There doesn't seem to be any effective way to get Riots attention on this (atleast in my opinion) very important topic, which might drive a sizeable part of the old soloQ population away from the game if ignored.

Currently there is no communication at all about the topic, all we have had in the last month was a twitter post that soloQ is still far off and then the forum post where they briefly mentioned, that there might be a very unlikely point in the future where they might remove soloQ (which seems like some PR bullshit to ease the community into the already planned removal of soloQ).

I don't want my enjoyment of this game to end like this.

Mind that this is not a thread about how you dislike dynamicQ or want soloQ back. This is about how to get Riots attention to help them figure out what keeps people like the soloQ crowd engaged to this game.

replies.body: I had never logged in to this board in the past 5 years I've been playing this game. I've never cared about unbalanced champions, bugs, trolls, or game play changes. But this dynamic queue only in ranked  is such poor idea and I felt I had to speak up against it. I've never had such a bad experience playing ranked since I started playing 5 years ago. So sad Riot won't even acknowledge the majority of players want solo Q and find a fix, or at least put up a poll.
They seemingly do not care. Nobody likes or wants Dynamic que, but Riot does not want to admit or acknowledge that its a failure.

Some of the League community wants Dynamic queue, but most of them don't play League competitively/seriously in Ranked, and some of the people who stated they prefer Dynamic queue don't even play Ranked to begin with. Can't forget about these types of people that Riot tried to abuse to support Dynamic queue over Solo queue in poorly made pie charts.

This isn't true. You know why? LoL is the only game Riot has to they don't have the luxury of not caring.

I'm a long time Starcraft fan and that game has declined and lost pretty much all the community. Does Blizzard care? Not that much, they have tons of other cash cows.

If LoL declines Riot will give a shit. This is it. There are no more games. This is where the cash is.

The problem I see is that League has no real competitors. 
And before the Dota fanboys (if there are any present) come at me with sharpened sticks, can you really say that Dota has the sheer scale of League, everything factored? No you can't. 

And what happens when you don't have to compete? You don't have to care. 
Riot has an iron-fisted grasp on the MOBA market with by and large the single biggest entry, and little to threaten it's throne.

Look at the rivalry between Microsoft and Apple in ages past, it forced them to genuinely innovate and improve to one up the other. 
Who does Riot have to one up? Nobody. Because they're already at the top.
